onBoarding.helpOrLookForSomeoneToHelpWithDayToDayTa: Help or look for someone to help with day-to-day tasks
onBoarding.selectTheServicesYouNeed: Select the services you need or are available to help with and access the list of required services to stay organized
onBoarding.listOfAvailableVolunteers: Access a list of available volunteers and select the one that best suits your needs
onBoarding.residenceAndTheTimes: Indicate your area of residence and the times when you will be available or when you will need a service
onBoarding.consultTheHistory: Consult the history of services provided, rating and date of service.
onBoarding.userDepending: Please choose the type of user depending on what you are looking for.

login.dontHaveAnAccountSignUp: Don’t have an account? Sign up.
login.enterTheEmailAddress: Enter the email address you used to sign up.
login.knowing: Knowing who you are going to work with can be very important for the user. Upload a photo of yourself where your face is visible.
login.adding: Adding a profile photo is not a mandatory step to register your account. Still, it would be great for volunteers to know who is asking them for help!
login.readAndAgree: I have read and agree with the
login.anyConditions: Tell us if you have any conditions
login.whichServices: Tell, us which services you will be able to provide and which health conditions you are comfortable to work with, so we can better match you with the users and their needs.
login.alreadyAccount: Already have an account? Log in.
login.youWithUs: We are happy to have you with us!
login.completeYourProfile: We just need you to tell us more about you to complete your profile.
login.pleaseDefine: Please define the area where you can help and the maximum distance you'll be able to travel to provide services.
login.volunteersYouRequest: We won't show your specific location. This information will only be shared with the volunteers you request.
login.optionsThatApply: Please select the options that apply. You can change these preferences later in your profile.
login.leastOneEmergencyContact: Please add at least one emergency contact to share with the volunteers you are going to request.
login.notEnterCheck: I will not enter any emergency contacts and I take responsibility for that.
login.name: Name
login.imageSize: Image size should not be greater than 100 MB

validate.confirm_passwordShouldBe: Confirm password should be at least
validate.reTypeNeWPassCannotEmpty: Re-type New Password cannot be empty
validate.confirm_password_must_be_same: Confirm Password must be same as password
validate.Confirm_password_can_not_be_same: Confirm password can not be same as any old Password
validate.Phone_cannot_contain_more_than_character: Phone cannot contain more than 15 characters
validate.Phone_cannot_contain_less_than_character: Phone cannot contain less than 8 characters
validate.gdpr_not_selected: Please read and agree with GDPR

forgot.weHaveSent: We have sent you an email to
forgot.recoverYourPassword: with the instructions to recover your password.
forgot.forgotTitle: Let’s recover it for you. Kindly enter your email address associated with your account.
forgot.linkSuccess: Hooray! We have sent a link to Reset your Password

request.cancelTheService: Are you sure you want to cancel the service?
request.notifyTheVolunteer: The service you had scheduled for
request.willBeCanceled: will be canceled and we will notify the user.
request.canceledUser: Your request was canceled by the user.
request.willNoLonger:
The user has canceled your order and will no longer need your services.

Keep an eye out, new requests may appear at any time!
request.canceled: Your request was canceled by the volunteer.
request.anotherVolunteer: Do you want to search for another volunteer for this request?
request.tellThe: Tell the volunteer what you need and he might be able to help you.

rate.allYour: All your reviews will appear on your profile.
rate.workDone: Your work is done and the user you provided your services to has already shared feedback about it!
rate.requestedHasEnded: The service you requested has ended. Please submit your review, your feedback is very important to us!
rate.reviewWillAppear: Your review will appear on the volunteer's profile.
rate.importantForTheCommunity: Your opinion is important for the community, as it will help other users to know about the experience with the volunteer.

volunteer.volunteerThatBestSuit: Find the help you need by choosing the options and the volunteer that best suit your needs.
volunteer.specificTime: It doesn't have to be at a specific time, I just need it done on the set day.
volunteer.pleaseConfirm: Please confirm your options and complete your request. You can go back if you want to make any changes.
volunteer.importantNotes: Important notes to share with the volunteer
volunteer.requestAccepted: Once the request is accepted, you will be able to talk with the volunteer and share more details.
volunteer.awaitingConfirmation:
Your request is now awaiting confirmation from the volunteer. 

You will be able to follow the status of your request in the “Requests” menu.
volunteer.alsoAvailable: Also available to provide other services that may arise and which are not included in the available services.

profile.deleteAccountContent: You will loose all your data and you’ll not be able to access the app. Are you sure you want to delete your account?

Availability.yourWeeklyAvailability: Tell us your weekly availability, so we can better match you with the users and their needs.
Availability.yourSettings: You can change all your settings in your profile at any time.

language.whichLanguages: Tell us which languages you speak, so users can find volunteers who can speak the same language.

errorMessage.error: Something went wrong please try after some time

success.error: Something went wrong please try after some time
success.register: You have registered successfully in AJUDAMAIS

about.about_text_1: Ajuda+ is project developed for Voxpop by mobinteg and co-financed by
about.about_text_3: and the European Regional Development Fund through the
about.about_text_5: VoxPop aims to develop mobility solutions that make life easier for all residents as well as those who visit Lisbon, seeking to respond to a set of non-technological challenges of digital innovation.
